overview:
“Laura leads the investment team at LTSave. Laura brings over 25 years of experience in the financial services industry. Prior to joining LTSave, Laura spent nine years as a senior consultant for Mercer Investment Consulting and advised institutional clients on investment policy, asset allocation, portfolio structure, and manager research/evaluation. Laura’s quantitative work at Mercer included the application of alpha/tracking error analysis in portfolio structuring. Laura’s experience also includes liability driven investing and risk budgeting for large plan sponsors. During her tenure at Mercer, Laura was partnered with Mercer’s retirement practice in developing actuarial expected rate of return assumptions for Mercer’s defined benefit clients.

Laura’s other experience includes portfolio management for high net worth clients at Fleet Investment Advisors (now Columbia Management), equity research, as well as securities and investment operations.

Laura graduated from Wellesley College, and received her MBA from Boston University. She holds the Chartered Financial Analyst designation.” (Source: Invesra)
